definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (he hath grasped, abbrev. for [[יהואחז]] (q.v.) cf. As. Ia-u-ḫa-zi (i.e. Ahaz) COT on 2Ki 16:8)

king of Judah, son of Jotham, father of Hezekiah 2Ki 15:38, 2Ki 16:1, 2Ki 16:2, 2Ki 16:5, 2Ki 16:7, 2Ki 16:8, 13 t. 2 K; Is 1:1, Is 7:1, Is 7:3, Is 7:10, Is 7:12, Is 14:28, Is 38:18; 1Ch 3:13, 2Ch 27:9 + 8 t. 2 Ch; Ho 1:1, Mic 1:1.
son of Micah, & great-grandson of Jonathan 1Ch 8:35, 1Ch 8:36, 1Ch 9:42 ( + 1Ch 9:41 cf. LXXL Vulgate).
